title: A Yandere As A Girlfriend, But That Doesn’t Matter Because When You Tell Her How Much You Love Her, She Gets All Twitchy And Cute - Novel Updates
tags: Clingy Lover   Devoted Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Oneshot   Persistent Love Interests   Yandere
author: Shiryu
description:
I, Mikyo Yuu, have a girlfriend that I’ve been dating since I was in junior high school. She is a yandere. She sends me messages every day, and if I send her even a few messages, I get dozens of notifications.	

I often wake up in the morning and before I know it, she’s home and on top of me.

Sometimes I have a feeling that makes me wonder if l am committing a crime by getting involved with other women.

It’s just that—if I tell her I love her, she twitches so adorably, so there’s no problem.>
